p.dialogue: "The dark... the rain... it gets me excited.$l"

"Hey, remember when we played that duet by the lake? This weather reminds me of that day.#$e#You really surprised me with that mini-harp... I never expected that. I guess that's why I like you so much.$l"
"Hey! I woke up early and did some exploring on my own. I found this and it reminded me of you. [768 767 769 66 82]#$e#Think you can find something better than that? I'm not so sure!$h"
"It might be a good day to visit the caves, huh? Just be careful out there.#$e#If you go, bring a Life Elixir or two."
"Maybe I'll boot up Journey Of The Prairie King today... one of these days I swear I'll beat it on my own.$h"
"%Abigail is lost in her music."
"The countryside looks more interesting on a day like this, don't you think?"
"I was just gazing out into the rainswept woods... I swear I saw something darker than black shifting around the trees.$6"
"It's a good night to see a ghost..."
"Can you feel it? There's a stillness in the rain..."
"On nights like this, I like to turn the light down low and just listen...$8"
"I felt like making some soup for dinner. I hope it's not too disgusting. [199 218 219 727 730]$h"
"Hey! You look like you've been hard at work. Can I help you relax?^Have you been working hard? You look cute when you're a little exhausted.$h"
"The sound of rain should put us right to sleep tonight."
"I always loved this place, long before you moved in. Now I can explore the farm whenever I want!$h"
"Hey, @. Heading out into the wild? I got you something...[286 287 205 732]#$e#Use that if you get into a tough spot. It should help keep you safe."
"Heading to the mines? Hey... if you find something tasty, remember to bring me a piece!$h"
"Hey! I'm just debating what I should do today. I'm not used to having this much freedom!"
"You don't mind if I do some re-decorating now and then, do you? I'm still excited to have a place of my own to work on."
"There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it."
"I had a good day, today. There's always something interesting goin on around here, if you look close enough."
"Hey! Tell me about your day. Did anything exciting happen?$h"
"I used to be a night owl, but I'm starting to enjoy the rhythm of life on the farm. It feels natural."
"*yawn*... I'm ready to call it a night pretty soon.$h"
"The sounds of the night are louder out here. I'll never stop enjoying that."
"Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...$l"
"The soft breeze is blowing mountain air throughout the valley today. It smells like fresh pine and sage."
"Hmm... I think we've got plenty of space for outdoor slime ranching!"
"Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it."
"It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about.$h"
"I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble*$h"
"I'm just going to hang out here, okay?#$e#There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle*$h"
"I'm going in to town today, just so you know. I need to stretch these legs a bit."
"Hey! Did you have a good day? Mine went well. It was refreshing to take a walk.$h"
"I can't believe I'm a \"mom\"... life is weird.$h"
"I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their chocolate cereal. They were screaming!"
"I had a dream that %kid2 will grow up to be a famous monster hunter. I've already been thinking about a little armor set."
"A cool old house, a couple kids, and an amazing farm. I never thought I'd come this far... but, hey! Our lives are just getting started.$h"
"Did you hear that? Sometimes I'm convinced this house is haunted.$u"
"Welwick's horoscope predicted great things for me today. I feel really motivated!"
"I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair... I swear, it never fades from this color..."
"I'm glad I owned a heavy pair of boots before moving in. It's hard to imagine tip-toeing around the mud in sneakers.$h"
"I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave.$l"
"Hey. I know you're smart, but I still worry about you sometimes. The world is full of monsters.$6#$e#Just promise me you'll be careful. I don't want to lose you."
"@? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for us. I'm really proud of you.$l"
"I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and shriveled. It's going to happen some day!"
"Do you think your Grandpa would be proud of us?"
"I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should visit my parents again soon."
"If you moved on to the spirit world, I'd set up a little shrine for you next to Grandpa's."
"No matter how much we clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms are kind of dirty."
"I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? I might get bored."
"I used to be special to you, your best friend... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s"
"You've been so cold to me lately... What's wrong with you? You're acting like a bog spirit...$s"
"I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sebastian before we met. He was probably the one...$s"
"So, do you have any big plans for the new year?"
"Hey, the egg festival is tomorrow. I'm sorry, but I won't go easy on you because we're married!$h#$e#I plan on winning that egg hunt. Go ahead and try to beat me."
"Do you have any new year's resolutions? I'm trying to lose a few pounds around the middle.$h"
"I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.#$e#I hope you like me pale!$h"
"Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, my love.#$e#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself."
"Sorry about the smell... I was sweating all night in the heat."
"It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's fun!$h"
"Ah... fall. This might be my favorite time of year. The colors really complement my hair, don't you think?"
"The scent is unmistakable... mushroom, rotting leaves, pumpkin. It's fall, alright. Isn't it lovely?"
"Can we grow giant pumpkins this season? Please, honey?$h"
"Honey... you're worth more to me than a chest full of quartz.#$e#Now, a chest full of amethyst? Hmm... I'd have to think about that one.$h"
"I actually like the cold weather. It just gives me an excuse to get cozy!$h"
"It's fun to explore the valley in winter! Everything is so different under a blanket of snow. And so quiet..."
"I may like the colder seasons, but by the end I'm always glad to see spring arrive."
"Oh man... I could go for some chocolate cake."
"Do I smell pumpkin on you? Maybe I'm just dreaming...$h"
"Remember when we played 'Prairie King' together in my room, so long ago? Those were good times.$h"
"#$c .5#I got up a little before you and fed David Jr. He's very active this morning.#$e#I hope you don't mind the guinea pig smell."
